page.title: 12Children's Games.
page.content: We play French cricket which is like English cricket but with different rules.There are no wickets and the batsman stays in the same place.The bowler tries to hit his legs with the ball and if he succeeds he is out.If the ball is hit the fielder has to bowl from wherever the ball has landed.Leap Frog is for two or more children.You jump over children who are bending over touching their toes. Once you have jumped over them all, you then bend down yourself so others can jump opver you.Fireball is a game where children form a circle and throw a ball around.If you drop the ball you must run around the circle and return to your place before the ball has gone completely around the circle. In Spot we take it in turns to throw or kick a ball at a wall.If you fail you drop out.The last one in is the winner.
